title: How long do I have to get to gold?
body: When does end of season finish? I'm so close to gold but still so far :x (by close I mean s2 ty)

replies.body:
Season usually ends on the 11/11 since Riot like the number.

They usually tell you the exact date about 1 month before the end of the season
well lets say you get 20 lp per game win every game depending were you are and how many games you play a day any were from a week to a month id say
Last season ended November 11th. Expect a similar season end this year. Goodluck with gold!
